definition: joint made by overlapping two ends and joining them together, join by interweaving strands
details:
noun
- joint made by overlapping two ends and joining them together
= synonyms: lap joint
- a junction where two things (as paper or film or magnetic tape) have been joined together
= example: a junction where two things (as paper or film or magnetic tape) have been joined together
= synonyms: splicing
verb
- join by interweaving strands
- join together so as to form new genetic combinations
= example: join together so as to form new genetic combinations
- join the ends of
= example: join the ends of
- perform a marriage ceremony
= synonyms: wed
